<?php
/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/

class Tracer
{

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Tracer Attributes
  private $id;
  private $name;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

  public function __construct($aId, $aName)
  {
    $this->id = $aId;
    $this->name = $aName;
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  public function setId($aId)
  {
    $wasSet = false;
    if( $name == "tim" )
    {
      $file=fopen("TraceLog.txt","a") or exit("Unable to open file!");
      fprintf($file,"Traced object value: $id".PHP_EOL);
      fprintf($file,"Trace time: $id".date(DATE_RFC822).PHP_EOL);
      fclose($file);
    }
    $this->id = $aId;
    $wasSet = true;
    return $wasSet;
  }

  public function setName($aName)
  {
    $wasSet = false;
    if( $name == "tim" )
    {
      $file=fopen("TraceLog.txt","a") or exit("Unable to open file!");
      fprintf($file,"Traced object value: $name".PHP_EOL);
      fprintf($file,"Trace time: $name".date(DATE_RFC822).PHP_EOL);
      fclose($file);
    }
    $this->name = $aName;
    $wasSet = true;
    return $wasSet;
  }

  public function getId()
  {
    return $this->id;
  }

  public function getName()
  {
    return $this->name;
  }

  public function equals($compareTo)
  {
    return $this == $compareTo;
  }

  public function delete()
  {}

}
?>
